app_descript:
Find My Phone By Clap

Brief

Find My Phone By Clap is a nifty utility app that helps users locate their misplaced smartphones simply by clapping. No more rummaging through couch cushions or retracing steps; a firm clap is all it takes to trigger your phone to respond, making it considerably easier to pinpoint its location.
